categories.title: Gemini AI Photo Prompts: Figurines
categories.description: Turn screenshots and portraits into collectible figurine displays complete with branded packaging and workstation props.

categories.title: Gemini AI Photo Prompts: Product Campaigns
categories.description: Copy & paste ready Gemini product photography prompts for pet food, retail flatlays, and lifestyle ecommerce stories.

categories.title: Gemini AI Photo Prompts: Exploded Views
categories.description: High-impact Gemini technical breakdown imagery for hardware decks, crowdfunding pages, and component reveals.

categories.title: Gemini AI Photo Prompts: Lifestyle Fusion
categories.description: Blend talent portraits, props, and multiple products into story-driven lifestyle scenes ready for social, ads, or lookbooks.

prompts.title: Gemini Collector Figurine Portrait
prompts.description: Gemini AI photo prompt that converts a portrait into a collectible figurine display with branded packaging and workstation details.
prompts.template:
Transform this portrait photo into a character figurine render.

Context:
- Input photo: [PHOTO_URL]
- Character vibe: [STYLE] (e.g. cyberpunk hacker, pop star, heroic explorer)

Scene requirements:
1. Figurine centered on a circular PVC base that looks glossy and premium.
2. Behind the figurine, add a branded packaging box featuring the character artwork.
3. On the left side, show a monitor displaying the 3D modeling process in Blender.
4. Lighting should be bright studio lighting with moderate saturation to highlight details.
5. Keep the shot indoors on a clean workstation with subtle depth of field.

Deliver a 4K, square composition with crisp edges and playful toy aesthetics.

prompts.title: Gemini Anime Figurine Twin Pack
prompts.description: Gemini AI photo prompt for producing twin anime figurines from cosplay or character portraits.
prompts.template:
Generate two matching anime-style figurines based on the source images.

Inputs:
- Portrait 1: [PHOTO_URL_1]
- Portrait 2: [PHOTO_URL_2]
- Theme: [THEME] (e.g. neon idols, fantasy warriors)

Rendering directives:
- Pose each figurine with complementary stances and expressive gestures.
- Place both on coordinated bases with the same logo treatment.
- Behind them, stack two packaging boxes showing individual character art.
- Lighting should be punchy and saturated, simulating a convention display.
- Keep materials glossy and colorful, with subtle rim lights to define silhouettes.

Return a 16:9 hero shot suitable for campaign key art.

prompts.title: Gemini Figurine Prompt: Black Myth Zhong Kui
prompts.description: Game character figurine prompt for Gemini Nano Banana that turns a Black Myth: Zhong Kui screenshot into a collectible display scene.
prompts.template: Please turn this screenshot of the game character into a character figure riding on an Asian tiger. Behind it, place a PlayStation game box printed with the character's image and the game title 'Black Myth: Zhong Kui.' Next to it, add a computer with its screen displaying the in-game scene, complete with the game's UI and the character. In front of the game box, add a round plastic base for the figure and have it stand on it. The PVC material of the base should have a crystal-clear, translucent texture, and set the entire scene indoors.

prompts.title: Gemini Pet Food Moss Tableau
prompts.description: Copy & paste Gemini AI photo prompt for lush pet-food campaigns with fresh nutrition storytelling props.
prompts.template:
Product promotional image for premium pet food.

Scene blueprint:
- Base environment: emerald moss-covered ground with pockets of ferns and dew.
- Hero product: [PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION] placed center on a natural wood stump.
- Supporting ingredients: fresh chicken breast, avocado slices, salmon portions, wooden bowl of freeze-dried chunks, scattered herbs.
- Wildlife element: a well-groomed cat interacting with the product.
- Background: soft blur of a forest log and dappled sunlight.
- Lighting: simulate golden-hour outdoor light with gentle volumetric rays.

Frame as a medium shot, 4:5 ratio, emphasising freshness and wholesome nutrition.

prompts.title: Gemini Sunlit Snack Flatlay
prompts.description: Gemini AI photo prompt that builds a bright, scroll-stopping snack flatlay for retail and DTC launches.
prompts.template:
Create a flatlay hero shot for [SNACK_BRAND] seasonal packaging.

Composition guide:
- Camera angle: overhead, 90 degrees.
- Surface: emerald moss layered with a wrinkled pastel tablecloth.
- Central focus: wooden tray holding two product packages on a textured cloth.
- Surrounding props: abundance of fresh strawberries, blueberries, cookies, and fruits arranged organically.
- Accent: wicker flower basket with seasonal blooms in one corner.
- Lighting: bright natural sunlight with alternating shadows and highlights.
- Palette: vibrant reds, yellows, and greens balanced against the moss backdrop.

Deliver as a 3:2 image optimized for e-commerce hero banners.

prompts.title: Gemini Cozy Appliance Lifestyle Scene
prompts.description: Gemini AI photo prompt staging cozy home appliance lifestyle shots with warm, lived-in interiors.
prompts.template:
Generate a lifestyle product shot for [APPLIANCE_NAME].

Scene details:
- Location: sunlit living room with wooden cabinets, framed art, and thriving plants.
- Hero setup: product centered on a hardwood console with complementary ceramics and glassware.
- Human element: [MODEL_DESCRIPTION] casually enjoying the space (e.g. sipping coffee, reading).
- Extra styling: soft textiles, books, decorative trays, and a cat or pet accent if relevant.
- Lighting: soft directional sunlight creating gentle light/shadow interplay.
- Mood: cozy, aspirational, high-end yet approachable.

Output a 4K horizontal composition ready for social and paid ads.

prompts.title: Gemini Cinematic Exploded View
prompts.description: Gemini AI photo prompt that showcases internal product engineering with floating component stacks.
prompts.template:
Render an ultra-detailed exploded view for [PRODUCT_NAME].

Specifications:
- Orientation: horizontal linear layering with perfectly aligned components.
- Materials: brushed metal, carbon fiber, glass, electronic boards.
- Lighting: soft cinematic side lighting to reveal depth and precision.
- Palette: cool futuristic tones (graphite, deep blue, silver) with subtle emissive accents.
- Background: minimal gradient with volumetric haze for drama.
- Labeling: leave clean space around layers for typography overlays.

Produce an 8K image suitable for keynote slides and landing pages.

prompts.title: Gemini Morning Workflow Fusion
prompts.description: Gemini AI photo prompt for cross-promotion desk scenes mixing lifestyle props, devices, and breakfast details.
prompts.template:
Generate a multi-product lifestyle scene featuring [PRODUCT_A] and [PRODUCT_B].

Scene plan:
- Setting: bright indoor workspace with sunlight streaming from the left.
- Props: open laptop showing a web page, breakfast plate (croissant, fried egg, vegetables), steaming mug, scattered fruits, stacked books, pen holder, green plants.
- Action: two hands interacting with the laptop, suggesting remote work.
- Lighting: soft natural light with layered shadows, high saturation for a fresh feel.
- Composition: 3/4 view focusing on the desktop, products centered with complementary props framing them.

Deliver a 16:9 composition ready for hero banners.

prompts.title: Gemini Character Consistency Series
prompts.description: Gemini AI photo prompt set that keeps the same talent consistent across multiple portrait and lifestyle scenes.
prompts.template:
Create a set of three lifestyle images featuring the same talent interacting with [PRODUCT_NAME].

Guidelines:
- Source reference: [MODEL_REFERENCE_PHOTO]
- Scene variations: [SCENE_1], [SCENE_2], [SCENE_3] (e.g. kitchen counter blow-dry, lounge chair coffee, standing by walnut cabinet).
- Keep wardrobe cohesive with minor variations (color accents, accessories).
- Ensure facial features, hairstyle, and proportions remain consistent across shots.
- Lighting: warm indoor lighting with directional highlights to sculpt form.
- Deliverable: horizontal triptych or individual 4:5 frames.
